short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Synapse extension is a wallet for Nervos CKB

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Synapse extension is a wallet for Nervos CKB. All users that in ckb ecosystem can use this extension to manage their assets. It support user defined tokens and other tokens defined in ckb. Also can work with defi protocols.
